text: Club Deportivo Toledo, S.A.D. "B" is the reserve team of CD Toledo, a Spanish football team based in Toledo, in the autonomous community of Castile-La Mancha. Founded in 2007 it plays in Tercera División – Group 18 and , holding home games at Estadio Salto del Caballo, with a seating capacity of 5,300 spectators.
